slide1.title: Soar Above Paradise
slide1.description: Experience the ultimate freedom with our paragliding adventures. Discover breathtaking aerial views and unforgettable moments high above stunning landscapes.

slide2.title: Desert Expeditions
slide2.description: Journey through golden dunes on our authentic camel tours. Immerse yourself in ancient traditions while exploring the mesmerizing beauty of the desert.

slide3.title: Horseback Adventures
slide3.description: Connect with nature on our guided horse riding experiences. Explore scenic trails and create lasting memories in the saddle through diverse landscapes.

slide4.title: Quad Bike Thrills
slide4.description: Unleash your adventurous spirit with our high-energy quad biking tours. Navigate rugged terrains and experience adrenaline-pumping off-road adventures.

paragliding.title: Paragliding
paragliding.description: Soar through the skies and witness breathtaking panoramic views

camelTours.title: Camel Tours
camelTours.description: Traditional desert journeys with authentic cultural experiences

horseRiding.title: Horse Riding
horseRiding.description: Explore scenic trails and connect with nature on horseback

quadTours.title: Quad Tours
quadTours.description: High-energy off-road adventures through diverse terrains
quadTours.includes: Quad bike, helmet, safety briefing, refreshments

about.title: About Raja Ampat Adventures
about.description: We are passionate about creating unforgettable adventure experiences that connect you with nature and local culture. With over 10 years of expertise, we offer safe, authentic, and thrilling adventures.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Ready to embark on your next adventure? Get in touch with us!

tours.title: Discover Our Adventures
tours.subtitle: Experience the thrill of Morocco through our exclusive adventure tours. From soaring through the skies to exploring the desert sands.

paragliding.title: Paragliding
paragliding.description: Soar through the skies and witness breathtaking views of Morocco's landscapes from above. An unforgettable aerial adventure.

quad.title: Quad Biking
quad.description: Navigate through rugged terrains and desert paths on powerful ATVs. Perfect for adrenaline seekers and adventure enthusiasts.

camels.title: Camel Trekking
camels.description: Experience the traditional way of desert travel. Journey through golden dunes on the back of these gentle giants.

horses.title: Horse Riding
horses.description: Explore Morocco's beautiful countryside and beaches on horseback. Connect with nature in the most authentic way.

quote.title: Our Mission
quote.body: Fly Tandem is more than just a flight — it's a gateway to freedom, thrill, and Morocco’s raw beauty. We believe in making unforgettable aerial experiences accessible to everyone, while honoring the land, skies, and local communities that make it all possible.

team.title: Meet Our Expert Team
team.subtitle: USHPA Certified Instructors & Tandem Pilots
team.description: Our team of certified USHPA instructors brings over 15 years of combined experience and thousands of flight hours to ensure your paragliding adventure is both safe and unforgettable.

certifications_details.ushpa: United States Hang Gliding and Paragliding Association

paragliding.title: Paragliding Over Marrakech
paragliding.description: Take off on a once-in-a-lifetime tandem paragliding experience over the Agafay Desert. Glide through the skies with our certified pilots and witness Morocco from an unforgettable perspective.

expertFlights.title: Expert-Led Tandem Flights
expertFlights.description: Our agency specializes in organizing paragliding flights across Marrakech and Morocco. Backed by a national team of aviation professionals with years of hands-on expertise.

pricing.title: Price Per Person
pricing.description: Enjoy your full tandem paragliding experience for just 700 Dhs. Advance booking required.

itinerary.title: Flight Itinerary
itinerary.description: Your experience begins with a group pickup and scenic drive to the launch site. After safety checks and a take-off briefing, you'll soar into the sky for 10–20 minutes.

included.title: What's Included
included.description: Each flight includes round-trip transport from Marrakech, a 10 to 20-minute tandem flight, full safety equipment including helmet, and optional photo/video package.

safety.title: Certified Safety Standards
safety.description: We are the only insured paragliding company in Morocco. Our team follows strict daily safety protocols and uses certified equipment. All pilots are USHPA licensed.

eligibility.title: Who Can Fly
eligibility.description: Paragliding is open to nearly everyone. We fly passengers aged 4 and up, including seniors. Weight range: 20kg-110kg. No prior experience required.

tour.name: Paragliding Agafay Experience
tour.description: A thrilling tandem flight over the Agafay Desert with certified pilots.

arrival.title: Arrival at Meeting Point
arrival.desc: Meet the team and other participants at the designated spot near Aguergour.

drive.title: Drive to Launch Site
drive.desc: Hop in the 4x4 and head up the rocky tracks to the takeoff zone overlooking Agafay.

safety.title: Scenic Prep & Safety Briefing
safety.desc: Enjoy the desert view while pilots set up gear. Get briefed and geared up.

flight.title: Takeoff & Flight
flight.desc: Lift off and glide through the sky for 10–20 minutes, feeling the breeze.

landing.title: Smooth Landing
landing.desc: Land safely at our designated zone and review in-flight media.

transport.title: Optional Transport Back
transport.desc: Return transport available to Marrakech if booked in advance.

tea.title: Tea Pause
tea.desc: Relax and enjoy a traditional mint tea break in a Berber tent.

tour.transportNote: Transport from Marrakech available at extra cost.

quad.name: Agafay Desert Quad Adventure
quad.description: Ride through the rocky Agafay terrain with an adrenaline-pumping quad bike experience.

arrival.title: Arrival & Welcome
arrival.desc: Arrive at the base camp and meet your quad guide.

briefing.title: Safety Briefing
briefing.desc: Learn how to operate the quad and receive safety gear.

ride.title: Desert Ride
ride.desc: Cruise through rocky landscapes, dry riverbeds, and desert tracks.

break.title: Tea Break
break.desc: Pause at a Berber tent for mint tea and a quick rest.

return.title: Return Ride
return.desc: Head back to base camp and park your quad.

camel.name: Sunset Camel Ride in Agafay
camel.description: Experience a peaceful camel trek through the desert at golden hour.

arrival.title: Arrival & Check-in
arrival.desc: Arrive at the camp and get introduced to your camel.

dress.title: Traditional Dress-Up
dress.desc: Wear a cheich and outfit for a more authentic ride.

ride.title: Camel Trek Begins
ride.desc: Enjoy a calm ride over dunes and hills with scenic views.

sunset.title: Watch the Sunset
sunset.desc: Stop at a scenic viewpoint to soak in the Agafay sunset.

return.title: Return to Camp
return.desc: Ride back to the starting point and relax with tea.

horse.name: Morning Horseback Ride
horse.description: Explore the peaceful outskirts of Marrakech on a guided horseback ride.

arrival.title: Arrival & Introduction
arrival.desc: Meet your guide and get assigned to a horse based on your skill.

grooming.title: Grooming & Prep
grooming.desc: Brush and bond with your horse before mounting.

ride.title: Trail Ride
ride.desc: Ride through trails with views of the Atlas Mountains.

rest.title: Mid-Ride Break
rest.desc: Stop for water and a short rest in a shaded area.

return.title: Return to Stables
return.desc: Finish the loop and return to the ranch area.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Contact me directly on WhatsApp and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

0.question: Why should I trust Fly Tandem with my experience?
0.answer: We prioritize safety, professionalism, and unforgettable moments. Our certified pilots, clear process, and strong safety standards make us a trusted choice for paragliding and adventure experiences in Morocco.

1.question: Is there a free trial available?
1.answer: While we don't offer free flights (sadly 😅), you can always get a free consultation or visit to understand how it all works before booking.

2.question: How long will my experience last?
2.answer: The full experience takes around 2–3 hours including preparation, briefing, transport (if included), and flight. The flight itself lasts 10–20 minutes depending on conditions.

3.question: What happens if I stop or cancel? Can I get media?
3.answer: If the flight is cancelled due to weather or safety, we reschedule or refund. All photo/video content is available for download after your flight — even if cancelled mid-air for any reason.

4.question: Can I change my booking later?
4.answer: Yes! You can reschedule your booking up to 24 hours in advance. Just contact us via WhatsApp and we'll take care of it.

5.question: What's your cancellation policy?
5.answer: Full refunds are available up to 48 hours before the flight. After that, partial refunds may apply depending on the case.

services.title: Choose Your Next Adventure
services.subtitle: From the skies to the desert trails, explore our unique selection of unforgettable outdoor experiences around Marrakech.

gallery.title: Our Experience in Photos
gallery.description: A glimpse of the unforgettable moments captured during our tours and adventures.
